full_threads.body:
Hi Stella,

Sure. Confirming that we have already updated it for you. Let us know if you would like further changes.

Thanks Rica, please change the words 'bonus' and 'offer' to be lower case not upper-case starting letters. Thanks

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Duracube

Hi Stella, 

Hope all is well. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Thanks Heath. I think the text I supplied looks a bit incomplete on the website at the moment. Could we please change to be below text?

Our bonus offer
Your free antibacterial hand sanitiser stand redeemable with all orders over $15K, until 30 September 2020.

Thanks.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Ok sure, confirming we have added all of the text in now.

Sorry Heath I meant all of the text at the bottom of the email sig graphic to go on the banner.

So it'll say

BONUS OFFER
Free antibacterial hand sanitiser stand redeemable... Etc. All of this text.

Hi Stella, 

We have had to activate this so that you can see it. Perhaps have a look and let me know if you would like any changes? 
https://duracube.com.au/

@heath done updating the form and I also created an Edge slide for Bonus Offer based on the client request below. Here's what it looks like:
kindly check it too, thanks!

Thanks Rica, please could you Make all fields on this form mandatory so they've got to fill them in? Thanks

Regards,
Stella Simpson

Thanks Heath. I originally said to you we could use this email signature graphic for the website rotating banner but looking at it now, I'd like it to remain consistent with the rest of the banners there please. Sorry to change my mind.

Can you please get a new banner done up and draft sent to me prior to making it live on the website?

Use same layout as the rest of them on the website.
Use the sanitiser stand image for the background.
Use BONUS OFFER as the main header then the Free antibacterial hand sanitiser stand... text below it. Don't worry about any of our contact details off the email sig.
Then use a REDEEM MINE call to action button to go to the form Rica created.

Trust this makes sense. Thanks!

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Duracube

Hi Stella, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://duracube.com.au/free-stand/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

1 hour

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
@heath here the link for the page : https://duracube.com.au/?page_id=2188&preview=true
It's still in draft. Can you please check? Thanks!
@rica can you please have a go at creating this? Thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath,

Thanks for this. As discussed over the phone, please proceed setting up the webform with the below details:

REDEEM YOUR FREE HAND SANITISER STAND
Supporting our clients with free antibacterial hand sanitiser stands redeemable for all orders above $15K in September!

Many thanks for your order this month. We appreciate being able to help you make this project another success. To redeem your free hand sanitiser stand, please complete and submit the below form and we will get this stand to you fast.

Your name
Your company
Contact number
Email address
Shipping address
Relevant order reference
*Please provide the order number/sales reference on which you are claiming this stand. Total purchase order must reach or exceed $15,000 ex.GST and must be ordered (with Order Confirmation signed) before 30th September 2020.

(Disclaimer: Hand sanitiser stand design will remain consistent, but colour of the antibacterial compact laminate used may vary depending on available stock. Sanitiser unit brand may also vary depending on available stock. Unit does not come with sanitiser solution - your choice of sanitiser solution can be poured into the top of the unit and refilled as needed.)

SUBMIT
(this SUBMIT button is sent as an email to sales@duracube.com.au. If you can adjust what it says on the email sent to sales@duracube.com.au, please add to the top of the form "Hello sales team, Below is an order to redeem the free hand sanitiser station this month for every order over $15,000 ex.GST. Please verify the order to ensure it meets our terms, then process this order for a free hand sanitiser stand to be shipped to the below address at no cost. Thank you.")

Also Heath, once the above form is created, please send to us for approval before making it live on the website. Once approved, we will get you to upload the new email footer as a new website banner, with this link. Thanks.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228


Confidentiality Notice & Disclaimer: This email and any attachments are strictly confidential and remain the property of Duracube. It must not be disclosed to third parties without the express written approval of Duracube. If you are not the intended recipient you must not disclose or use the information in any way and must delete this email.
